title: General Application
description: The Sui Foundation exists to support the development, growth and adoption of the Sui network. Sui is the first permissionless Layer 1 blockchain designed from the ground up to enable creators and developers to build unique Web3 experiences from gaming to finance.The Sui Foundation is committed to three decentralization principles; Embrace transparency and level the playing field, Communicate openly to build a culture of trust, and Engage directly with the community.We're always looking for incredible people who might be a great add to our culture, have an interest in Web3, and who are excited to grow the Sui ecosystem. If that's you, we'd love to hear from you!Join our general applicant pool and be fast-tracked for future consideration in a Marketing, Developer Relations, or Ecosystem Growth role.Our team is 100% remote and we are hiring across the world. Here at the Sui Foundation, you’ll be joining a world-class team with tremendous growth potential as we bring the next billion users to web3.
